snippet: With magazines like Brooklyn Bound, Edible Brooklyn and The Brooklyn Rail, one couldn’t help but wonder: how much navel-gazing can a single borough sustain?
abstract: Magazines about Brooklyn continue to flood the market, all purporting to capture the borough's creative spirit; the latest is Brooklyn Bound, whose inaugural issue is devoted to Brooklyn's business community.
lead_paragraph: With magazines like Brooklyn Bound, Edible Brooklyn and The Brooklyn Rail, one couldn’t help but wonder: how much navel-gazing can a single borough sustain?

headline.seo: Magazines About Brooklyn Life Abound - Noticed
headline.main: In Brooklyn, Read All About Us
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, Read All About Us
